transcript.text: hi there welcome to my youtube channel
I'm your host praying medic here's
today's message
today's message will answer one of the
most common questions I received from
friends how do I know if what I'm
hearing is from God it's a really good
question and I wrote an article on this
subject some time ago and posted it on
my website praying Medicom a woman who
goes by the name of barefoot dreamer 59
liked the message so much she recorded
it and uploaded it on her YouTube
channel well I found it yesterday and I
really liked it so I downloaded her
video and I'm going to post it here if
there's something that I've written
whether it's a chapter from my book an
article or even a facebook status that
really inspired you and you want to read
it and upload it as a video go ahead and
do that and send me a link if I like it
I'll repost it here on my channel
hi guys yeah it's so good to be back so
I like to be original if you hadn't you
know figured that out about me already
but I found this article that I really
love so I'm gonna share it with you it's
called how to know if what you're
hearing is from God and it's from
praying medic and I'll put links in the
description so you can follow him too if
you want to
it goes like this I received a question
from a friend who wanted to know how she
could know for certain that what she was
seeing or hearing was from God so here's
my answer to this question
no one should allow themselves to be
tricked into thinking they're hearing
from God when they're not we need to
know that we aren't just imagining
things well I think it's impossible to
know with 100% certainty that you're
hearing from God and not yourself I
think we can achieve a high level of
certainty part of what we deal with when
we doubt that we're hearing from God is
a bias in our mind that has been placed
there by our educational system unless
you attended a Christian school system
it's likely that your default way of
thinking has been biased toward a
philosophy of naturalism that is to say
we've been taught to think that God if
he even exists rarely involves himself
in the affairs of men he rarely speaks
to us and if he does it's with a loud
booming voice that is so obvious it
can't be mistaken for anything else this
is the way I was taught to think about
God this philosophy creates doubt in our
mind that we can actually hear from a
God the truth of the matter is quite
different from this in the very
beginning of time when God first spoken
to the emptiness and the creation came
forth the voice of God has never stopped
speaking although some people find it
hard to recognize God's voice
he is always eternally speaking to his
creation the problem isn't that God
isn't saying anything the problem is
that our minds have been trained to
misinterpret his voice as our own
thoughts God communicates in a variety
of ways
among other modes of communication he
speaks to us through visions dreams and
faint thought impressions they carry
messages these things are at first
difficult to discern it's easy to
attribute them to our own minds but
here's the thing I noticed about God's
visions and thoughts that allows me to
distinguish them from my own I've been
travelling around the Sun for half a
century and that time I've come to know
my own way of thinking pretty well when
someone quotes me on Facebook and I see
it I recognize where the thought came
from if someone copied and pasted one of
my articles on their Facebook page and I
read it I would immediately recognize it
his mind if someone posted one of my
pencil drawings on their page I would
spot it and know that it was mine I
recognize my own thoughts when I hear
them I recognize the creative visual
material of my own mind when I see it
when I hear a thought that is unfamiliar
I also recognize it as not being from me
when I see a visual image that is
foreign to my own creativity
I recognize it as not mine God's
thoughts are much more sublime than my
own thoughts they're full of love full
of life full of wisdom full of
compassion and full of mercy my own
thoughts do not have these qualities
when I have a thought that oozes those
qualities I know it did not come from me
I know that every good and perfect thing
comes down from the Father of lights
James 1:17 so I know its source
immediately the same is true for visual
images God's images are full of
beautiful inexpressible colors textures
patterns and light they are often very
unearthly in appearance not always but
most of the time my mind doesn't conjure
up such images so again when I see these
I know the source must I know the source
can't be me so it must be God half the
Battle of knowing that what you're
seeing or hearing is from God is simply
a matter of knowing that it isn't from
you the other part of the equation is
faith well it would be great to know
with absolute certainty that what we're
seeing or hearing is from God his
kingdom doesn't work that way everything
we do in the kingdom is done by faith we
prophesy by faith we heal by faith
we raise the dead by faith faith is
trusting that the revelation we're
receiving is from God not knowing for
sure it's from him but trusting that
it's from him
the more you prophesied the more your
faith for prophecy grows the more you
heal the more your faith for healing
grows the more you walk on water the
more your faith for walking on water
grows the confirmation that you're
hearing God accurately is when you
examine the fruit of it you get an
impression that a stranger has back pain
and you ask them about it and they
confirm that they do have back pain the
revelation is confirmed you're hearing
from God you might get an impression
that you should enter a store and speak
to the person working behind the counter
about a death in their family if you go
in and talk with them and learn that
their mother just passed away and you're
able to comfort them the revelation is
confirmed you're hearing from God as we
obeyed the revelation we receive and it
produces fruit we grow in confidence
that we're hearing accurately from God
so I hope that encourages you and
challenges you the way it did me I love
you guys I'll talk to you later thanks
for dropping by I hope you enjoyed
today's message you might consider
sharing it with your friends you can do
that through the links provided below
the video if you have questions or

prang Medicom if you haven't visited my

it's WW pragmatic calm you can also

thanks for dropping by and I hope you'll
consider subscribing to my channel
you
